# bfnpALSprocessor

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package is used to prepare all available ALS data in the Bavarian Forest National Park and document the individual processing steps performed for each dataset. It mainly builds ready-to-use functions to reapeat certain processing steps to several different data sets and relies on lidR, sf and terra.
